title: Living by Ear
description: Can a forty-something mother of two teenagers divorce her husband, resume her career--after a sixteen-year hiatus--and also get a second chance at love?Christine Daley, a musician and former Boston celebrity, is giving it her best shot. Certainly she never planned to be in such a situation. When she married Jon--a successful attorney--she figured she'd find a healthy balance between family and her music. But the years went by and the marriage unraveled, and now Chris is determined to recover some happiness for herself. Unfortunately, Jon is throwing every obstacle he can in the way of the divorce, and the kids suddenly seem to need their mom more than ever. Is it possible for Chris to get what she wants without sacrificing the love, respect, and safety of her children?"....fresh, poignant and funny."-Kirkus Reviews
author: Mary Rowen
